4-Week Digital Learning Experience

Exploring Covocational Church Planting

A comprehensive learning journey combining video lessons, interactive tools, peer dialogue, and practice-based assignments to discover how mission and vocation belong together.

4h content
18 activities
Peer interaction

What You'll Achieve

Grasp of Covo benefits and challenges

Manage time, family, and ministry effectively

Interactive Tools

Peer Activities

Learning Design Principles

Built on adult learning theory (andragogy) and Kolb's learning cycle: Experience → Reflection → Conceptualization → Practice

Course Weeks

Week 1: A New Way to Lead and Live

Current

Introduction to Covocational Mindset

Discover how mission and vocation belong together, exploring real-life examples of covocational church planting through stories like Michael's coffee shop ministry.

3 videos
1 activities
1 assignments
1 discussions

Week 2: The Benefits of Going Covo

8 Advantages of Covocational Planting

Explore the eight key benefits including missional presence, credibility, financial sustainability, and holistic faith integration through interactive case studies.

Week 3: Overcoming the Challenges

Time, Margin, and Team Development

Learn the five anchors for managing life and discover your APEST gifts through interactive time management tools and assessments.

Week 4: Covo as Strategy, Not Model

Marketplace Callings, Nonprofit First, & Discernment

Explore 12 marketplace vocations, entrepreneurial strategies, and complete your personalized Covo Church Planting Blueprint.
